    Methods in org.cvs.application.api that return Candidate

    Candidate CandidateController.addNewCandidate​(Candidate candidate)

    Candidate CandidateController.getCandidate​(java.lang.Long candidateId)
    Fetches an active candidate via GET through URL: /candidates/active/{candidateId}.
